ServiceConditions.description: The `ServiceConditions` schema contains definitions for reporting the conditions present in the service that require attention.
ServiceConditions.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the overall conditions present in a service for a Redfish implementation.

title: #ServiceConditions.ServiceConditions
